Package uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui

Class Summary
AddOrderButton  
AddOrderPanel  
DrinkButton This class is a button that opens up a drink selection menu.
DrinkChoiceFrame  
MainFrame This class is a main frame of the program called by the Run class.
Menu This class implements a menu for the main frame.
OrderHistoryFrame This class returns a order history frame loading the XML file and showing all the orders by date.
OrderItemPanel  
PayFrame This class is the frame that is displayed when the Pay button is clicked.
PizzaButton This class is a button that is used to display pizza choice menu.
PizzaChoiceFrame This class is the menu that contains pizzas.
RightPanel This panel is the right panel of the frame, containing pay button and subtotal/tendered labels.
Run  
ShopItemButton This class is a button that is created for each item.
SideButton This class is the button that displays the side items choice frame.
SidesFrame This is the frame that holds all side items.
TopPanel This is the top panel of the main frame, holding buttons for menu selection and adding a new customer, as well as displaying the customer name.
